title: Jim McMahon – 2022 Comments on Liz Truss Lunch with Katherine Tai
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jim McMahon, the Shadow Secretary of State for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs, on 3 January 2022.
content:
In the same week Liz Truss fought for a taxpayer funded £1,400 lunch, she and 354 other Tories voted against Labours motion calling for funding to help kids catch up on education hit by the pandemic.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
